content: What is the name of the iconic painting by Grant Wood that depicts a farmer and his daughter, both looking rather stern?

The iconic painting you're referring to is "American Gothic." It was painted by Grant Wood in 1930 and is one of the most recognizable images in 20th-century American art. The painting shows a farmer standing beside his daughter in front of their Gothic-style house, both wearing serious expressions. The painting has been widely interpreted and parodied over the years, making it a cultural touchstone.
